Hopes Delight (Brig) log book
Chase, Jonathan
AHMC - Hopes Delight (Brig)
1 volume(s)
1825 Logbook of the brig Hopes Delight kept by Jonathan Chase on two voyages: New York to St. Croix and back (April-May 1825); and New York to Madeira to Oporto and back to New York (June-November 1825). Most entries pertain to the weather and routine shipkeeping. The last few entries reveal that upon arrival back in New York from Oporto, the mate and crew deserted the ship, leaving Chase alone to get the cargo unloaded and decks cleaned.
